scripts.start: npm run copy-dependencies && npm run config-db && npm run init-db && nodemon --exec babel-node server.js
scripts.init-db: echo 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS users_relational; CREATE DATABASE users_relational CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci' | mysql -h 0.0.0.0 -uroot
scripts.config-db: echo 'use mysql;update user set authentication_string="", plugin="mysql_native_password" where user="root";flush privileges;' | mysql -h 0.0.0.0 -uroot
